participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Family-oriented and introspective, she values her relationships but often feels incomplete without her dog.
participant_1.background: I am close to my family, but we are all very busy. I am short. Since my dog died I’m incomplete. I got hired as a security guard. I try to avoid my sister-in-law in the morning so that I can focus on my family and business.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and passionate about his hobbies, he enjoys baking despite the disapproval from his parents.
participant_2.background: I've kept my love of baking from my parents because they think it's a waste of time. My car has to be as fast as my motorcycle. I have won an Olympic medal. I used to work for a cable company. I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.

content.text: Hi!
Hi there! How are you today?
Doing well! How about you?
I'm doing good! Just got back from a trip to Europe.
Oh that sounds fun! Where did you go?
We went to London, Paris, and Barcelona.
Wow! That sounds amazing. I've always wanted to go to Europe.
You should! It's a beautiful place.
I'm sure it is. I'll have to put it on my bucket list.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, go out to eat, and watch sports.
Oh that sounds fun. I like to do similar things. I also like to bake.
Oh really? What do you like to bake?
I like to bake anything, but my favorite is probably chocolate chip cookies.
Oh chocolate chip cookies are my favorite too! I love baking with chocolate.
Me too! I have to be careful though because I can't stop eating them!
Me neither! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
It is! Nice to meet you too.
You too!
